edu.cmu.ri.rcommerce
Interface LocationListener

public interface LocationListener

Interface for classes that are interested in receiving real-time location data. Provides a set of callbacks for updating position, heading, and status.

Author:
Nisarg

Method Summary
 void broadcastLocationStatusChange(int status)
          Callback for being notified of a change in status.
 void broadcastLocationUpdate(double x, double y, double theta, long time, double velocity)
          Callback for being notified of a change of position.
 void broadcastRelativeLocationUpdate(double dR, double dTheta, double timeDiff)
          Callback for being notified of incremental changes of position.
 

Method Detail

broadcastLocationUpdate

void broadcastLocationUpdate(double x,
                             double y,
                             double theta,
                             long time,
                             double velocity)
Callback for being notified of a change of position.

Parameters:
x - X position in meters
y - Y position in meters
theta - orientation in radians
time - time in unix format

broadcastRelativeLocationUpdate

void broadcastRelativeLocationUpdate(double dR,
                                     double dTheta,
                                     double timeDiff)
Callback for being notified of incremental changes of position. NOTE: does not update when global offsets are changed

Parameters:
dR - straight line distance traveled since last update
theta - new heading (TODO: this should be relative, but that would require converting the particle filter from x,y to velocity, heading
timeDiff - time since the last update in seconds

broadcastLocationStatusChange

void broadcastLocationStatusChange(int status)
Callback for being notified of a change in status. See the constants defined in the localization method for the meaning of the status argument
